mapper.insert: insert into pg_trigger (tgrelid, tgname, tgfoid, tgtype, tgenabled, tgisinternal, tgconstrrelid, tgconstrindid, tgconstraint, tgdeferrable, tginitdeferred, tgnargs, tgattr, tgqual, tgoldtable, tgnewtable, tgargs) values (#{tgrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgfoid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tgtype,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{tgenabled,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tgisinternal,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tgconstrrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tgconstrindid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tgconstraint,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tgdeferrable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tginitdeferred,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tgnargs,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{tgattr,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{tgqual,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{tgoldtable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgnewtable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tgargs,jdbcType=BINARY})
mapper.select: select tgrelid, tgname, tgfoid, tgtype, tgenabled, tgisinternal, tgconstrrelid, tgconstrindid, tgconstraint, tgdeferrable, tginitdeferred, tgnargs, tgattr, tgqual, tgoldtable, tgnewtable, tgargs from pg_trigger
